rows.label: tlk006301_06_msg0001
rows.name:
We, the people of Luxuria, were
raised hearing the tales of the
hero Adel as our lullabies.

rows.label: tlk006301_06_msg0002
rows.name:
Therefore, we were well
aware of the dangers of
the Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: tlk006301_06_msg0003
rows.name:
We feared that the Heaven's
Holy Grail would once again
bring destruction.

rows.label: tlk006301_06_msg0004
rows.name:
However, I now understand
that we were mistaken.

rows.label: tlk006301_06_msg0005
rows.name:
The Heaven's Holy Grail belongs
by your side. Please, you must
retrieve her from Iira.
